questionTitle: Which of the following type is missing in the following figure?
questionExplanation: In cloud computing, you can often increase capacity on demand quickly and efficiently.

questionOption1: Use of different machine instance sizes is an attempt to create standard servers
questionOption2: Reducing the variability between servers makes it easier to troubleshoot problems and simpler to deploy and configure new systems
questionOption3: A server with the same set of software, system configuration, and hardware should perform similarly if given the same role in an infrastructure
questionExplanation: As much as possible, you also should assign servers standardized roles and populate those servers with identical services.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance has 68.4GB of memory and 26 EC2 Compute Units?
questionExplanation: I/O Performance is high and API name is m2.4xlarge.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance is used by default in AMI?
questionExplanation: Small Instance has 1.7GB memory and 1 EC2 compute unit.

questionOption1: In practice, there is less performance variability in cloud machine instances
questionOption2: Capacity planning seeks to compare the capability of one system against another system
questionOption3: Capacity planning provides the service with the best operational parameters at the lowest cost
questionExplanation: This variability may be due to your machine instances or storage buckets being moved from one system to another system.

questionTitle: Which of the following graph correctly describes relative costs and efficiencies of different physical and virtual servers?
questionExplanation: This type of graph allows you to add the appropriate server type to your infrastructure while performing a cost analysis of the deployment.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance has an API name: m2.4xlarge?
questionExplanation: High-CPU Extra Large Instance has 7GB of memory and 20 EC2 Compute Units.

questionTitle: EC2 Compute Unit is the equivalent of a _____ GHz 2007 Opteron or 2007 Xeon processor.
questionExplanation: We may add or substitute measures that go into the definition of an EC2 Compute Unit.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance has the lowest performance in AMI?
questionExplanation: Not all cloud computing infrastructures automatically manage your capacity.

questionTitle: Which of the following cloud computing infrastructures automatically manage your capacity?
questionExplanation: API name for a small instance is m1.small.
